title: High-tech security can't stop theft, frisky patrons at employee-free businesses - New York Post
content: High-tech security can't stop theft, frisky patrons at employee-free businesses  New York Post
description: Fledgling chains of high-tech gyms and recreational spots that don’t have on-site employees are cropping up nationwide – and some are grappling with shoplifting and randy customers. Their novel bus…
